item.title: Auto login
item.dc:creator: @maggot525 maggot525
item.description:
@maggot525 wrote:

This is my first script it sucks, I know. It logs you in… duh. Uses Bitmaps :D! Question: Could this be used as an include if i were to make it better?

[code]

program loginDaChar;
procedure SendString(text : string);
var
TempInt, TempInt1 : Integer;
TempChar : Char;
begin
for TempInt := 1 to Length(text) do
begin
TempChar := StrGet(text, TempInt);
TempInt1 := GetKeyCode(TempChar);
KeyDown(TempInt1);
Wait(30 + Random(50));
KeyUp(TempInt1);
Wait(30 + Random(200));
end;
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
end;

const
UserName=‘Username’;
PassWord=‘passwurrd’;

var
Login,Log2in, x, y, time: Integer;

begin
time:=0;
Login := BitmapFromString(42, 16, ‘beNrtkLEKgDAMRPtP/pOLdND’ +
‘vcFDQSRDExc80cHCEoxREuuW4ocmVvKYpHfNwLtncd8nM0nd4gBFd’ +
‘azbf22iWCCkilDizpITFskJHh/M9nZcF94cuD5DtirsL7tknWOiYV’ +
‘v95DyW6BZ3rF9GYL2jSEX2ih0KhUKitXnf59MM=’);

Log2in := BitmapFromString(48, 9, ‘beNrtUkEKgDAM65/8kxfx4Ec’ +
‘EwQcoftRJoYSm1O4oWHJYlzSErSLj8ODc5oZrX7qgU4aQVf/cR6By’ +
‘vbKhBikUuHhIOaW1nEfHj3VCN3w68+EWZQzHYn5rK3lcAIynhybGe’ +
‘F15XFv5L763m5DipWIfXqfkfdxCJnnCryzu82uev75UNwvfVaA=’);

If(findbitmap(Login, x, y))then
Movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(1300+random(700));
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(100+random(1000));

If(findbitmap(Log2in,x,y))then
SendString(UserName + chr(13));
wait(1000+random(1200));

SendString(PassWord)

Movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(1400+random(900));

clickmouse(x,y,true);

end.

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2008, 02:14:56 pm[/size][hr][sarcasm]
Thanks for the feedback!
[/sarcasm]
